name: slime pit
description: You've developed the ability to go dormant as a slime pit trap. While hibernating, you heal slowly, consume no food or water, but cannot move or act.

transform.msg_transform: You sink into the ground, becoming a dormant slime pit...

name: hibernating slime pit
description: You are currently dormant as a slime pit. You heal slowly but cannot move or act until you deactivate this state.

transform.msg_transform: You emerge from your dormant state, ready to act again.
